Key Match Events: Detroit Tigers came back from a 3-0 deficit to win 4-3 against the Tampa Bay Rays.
Colt Keith hit a game-tying single in the eighth inning.
Justyn-Henry Malloy drove in the go-ahead run with a sacrifice fly.
Jason Foley secured his 27th save of the season by striking out Jose Siri.
Post-Match Reflections: Bally Sports Detroit play-by-play announcer Jason Benetti delivered an iconic call as the game went final.
The Tigers have won 30 of their last 39 games, significantly improving their standings.
Detroit is currently tied with the Kansas City Royals for the second AL Wild Card spot.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Detroit's magic number to clinch a playoff spot is now two.
FanGraphs gives the Tigers a 96.6% chance of reaching the postseason.
